subtitleNullable: 20 lakhs+ historic data of cryptos such as Bitcoin,Ethereum,Tether,Dogecoin etc
descriptionNullable:
## Context

Cryptocurrency arrived at the global stage not too long ago but has already become one of most sought after technologies already. Since the introduction of cryptocurrency, Bitcoin in 2009, the entire market of cryptocurrency is prospected and continues to flourish. To date, there are over 4,000 cryptocurrency have been created. Cryptocurrency trading and exchange are highly data dependent. Having the data of past prices and factors affecting the costs in future can go a long way in figuring out which cryptocurrency to invest in, which transaction to be a part of and much more.

With the help of cryptocmd package, the cryptocurrency data can be collected and structurally stored to provide the traders with a reliable basis to make their decisions.

### Content

Dataset (in .csv) contains historic share values of different cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Binance Coin, Dogecoin etc. 

| __Variable__ | __Defination__ |__Dtype__ |
|-------------|------------|------------|
| date         | Date     |datetime64     |
| Symbol         |    Symbol of stock   |  char   |
| Open         |  Opening Value    |float32    |
| High         |  High Value     |float32    |
| Low         |  Low Value     |float32    |
| Close        |  Closing Value     |float32    |
| Volume        |  Volume of the Stock     |float32    |
| Market Cap         |  Market capital of the stock     |float32    |


### Acknowledgements

Data has been scraped from the publicly available website https://coinmarketcap.com for study purpose.

### Inspiration

Traders, buyers, sellers, whoever it may be, everyone depends on data in one way or other to make their decisions of exchange. This data could be used to analyze the pattern, trend also translate data into information which will produce more accurate results for referrer.
title: 2700+ Crypto Currency Market Price
subtitle: 20 lakhs+ historic data of cryptos such as Bitcoin,Ethereum,Tether,Dogecoin etc
description:
## Context

Cryptocurrency arrived at the global stage not too long ago but has already become one of most sought after technologies already. Since the introduction of cryptocurrency, Bitcoin in 2009, the entire market of cryptocurrency is prospected and continues to flourish. To date, there are over 4,000 cryptocurrency have been created. Cryptocurrency trading and exchange are highly data dependent. Having the data of past prices and factors affecting the costs in future can go a long way in figuring out which cryptocurrency to invest in, which transaction to be a part of and much more.

With the help of cryptocmd package, the cryptocurrency data can be collected and structurally stored to provide the traders with a reliable basis to make their decisions.

### Content

Dataset (in .csv) contains historic share values of different cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Binance Coin, Dogecoin etc. 

| __Variable__ | __Defination__ |__Dtype__ |
|-------------|------------|------------|
| date         | Date     |datetime64     |
| Symbol         |    Symbol of stock   |  char   |
| Open         |  Opening Value    |float32    |
| High         |  High Value     |float32    |
| Low         |  Low Value     |float32    |
| Close        |  Closing Value     |float32    |
| Volume        |  Volume of the Stock     |float32    |
| Market Cap         |  Market capital of the stock     |float32    |


### Acknowledgements

Data has been scraped from the publicly available website https://coinmarketcap.com for study purpose.

### Inspiration

Traders, buyers, sellers, whoever it may be, everyone depends on data in one way or other to make their decisions of exchange. This data could be used to analyze the pattern, trend also translate data into information which will produce more accurate results for referrer.
